Title: A Little Princess
Writer: Frances Hodgson Burnett (novel), Richard LaGravenese (screenplay), Elizabeth Chandler (screenplay)
Actors: Liesel Matthews, Eleanor Bron, Liam Cunningham, Rusty Schwimmer
Plot: A young girl is relegated to servitude at a boarding school when her father goes missing and is presumed dead.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 7 nominations.
